item.title: RT by @JohannaWhelehan: Hi guys, it’s in everyone’s interest to get as many people voting as possible. We’re offering free parking to help get people to the polls in the wet/cold and we’d love for you to share our initiative! https://hubs.ly/H0mbRt80 @bbclaurak @afneil @mrjamesob @Peston #BeAVoter

item.title:
RT by @JohannaWhelehan: You earn £82k per year.
You pay £9 per month for Spotify, £10 for Netflix
And £8.33 per month in your subscription to: Free healthcare Free education Properly funding the NHS Lifting children out of poverty Ending the climate crisis Ending homelessness
https://labour.org.uk/fairtaxcalculator
item.dc:creator: @UKLabour
item.description:
You earn £82k per year.

You pay £9 per month for Spotify,
£10 for Netflix

And £8.33 per month in your subscription to:
Free healthcare
Free education
Properly funding the NHS
Lifting children out of poverty
Ending the climate crisis
Ending homelessness

labour.org.uk/fairtaxcalcula…

item.title: RT by @JohannaWhelehan: It’s #AntiBullyingWeek2019. Tomorrow @hpmawales will hold it’s Annual Conference - Respect and Resolution in the Workplace. No better time to highlight the impact of bullying and incivility and how best we work to resolve this in the workplace #bekind #resolutionrevolution

item.title: RT by @JohannaWhelehan: I ❤️ you nurses. My family spent 21 months in & out of (mostly in) London hospitals & the consistent, skilled, LOVING care they showed my son Henry and the rest of my family will inspire me for the rest of my life. Thank you & count on me forever.
item.dc:creator: @robdelaney
item.description:

item.title: RT by @JohannaWhelehan: "This is our mother." In a landmark claim, Torres Strait Islanders argue that Australia, by failing to take adequate steps to reduce carbon #emissions, has violated their fundamental right to maintain their culture. #ourislandsourhome #climatechange https://www.nytimes.com/2019/05/12/world/australia/climate-human-rights-island-culture.html
item.dc:creator: @350Australia
item.description: "This is our mother." In a landmark claim, Torres Strait Islanders argue that Australia, by failing to take adequate steps to reduce carbon #emissions, has violated their fundamental right to maintain their culture. #ourislandsourhome #climatechange nytimes.com/2019/05/12/world…

item.title: RT by @JohannaWhelehan: “The current economy is now using 1.7 earths…We’re being taught this is the way of life. It’s not, it’s the way of death.” Chapeau to #ExtinctionRebellion for handing the mic to common sense thinkers while most of our politicians stutter on in silence
item.dc:creator: @AliceBHarrison

item.title:
RT by @JohannaWhelehan: #Marr: "That was an unacceptable comparison, wasn't it?"
Lammy: "Andrew, I would say that that wasn't strong enough"
Labour MP David Lammy defends his choice of language around the Conservative Party’s ERG
#Brexit http://bbc.in/2uDhMPi
item.dc:creator: @BBCPolitics
item.description:
